title: Drawing, "Semi-Draped Female Figure", 1650–70
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower center: Di Andrea di Salerno (?)
dimensions: 15.2 x 14 cm (6 in. x 5 1/2 in.), irregular
description: A semi-draped reclining female nude, her right arm over head, and resting her chin on her left fist. Below, partial study of the same figure. Probably copies from antique statuary.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Semi-Draped Female Figure", 1650–70.
1650–70. Red chalk on paper. Gift of Hugh Cassel. 1958-143-65.
